輕.definition: light; easy; gentle; soft; reckless; unimportant; frivolous; small in number; unstressed; neutral; to disparage

輕便.definition: lightweight and portable; light and convenient

輕取.definition: to beat easily; to gain an easy victory

輕口薄舌.definition: (idiom) hasty and rude; caustic and sharp-tongued

輕嘴薄舌.definition: lit. light mouth, thin tongue (idiom); hasty and rude; caustic and sharp-tongued

輕型軌道交通.pinyin: qīng xíng guǐ dào jiāo tōng
輕型軌道交通.definition: light rail; transit system (underground, at street level or elevated); streetcar; metro; abbr. to 輕軌|轻轨[qing1 gui3]

輕巧.definition: dexterous; deft; easy; light and easy to use; nimble; agile; lithe; graceful

輕微.definition: slight; light; trivial; to a small extent

輕快.definition: light and quick; brisk; spry; lively; effortless; relaxed; agile; blithe

輕手輕腳.definition: (idiom) (to move or do sth) softly; quietly; gently

輕捷.definition: light on one's feet; nimble; agile

輕描淡寫.definition: (idiom) to treat sth as no big deal; to downplay; to understate

輕擊球.definition: to hit the ball lightly (sport); putt (golf)

輕於鴻毛.definition: light as a goose feather (idiom); trifling; unimportant

輕機關槍.definition: also written 輕機槍|轻机枪; light machine gun

輕水.definition: light water (as opposed to heavy water); see light water reactor 輕水反應堆|轻水反应堆

輕盈.definition: graceful; lithe; light and graceful; lighthearted; relaxed

輕者.definition: less serious case; in less severe cases

輕聲.definition: quietly; softly; neutral tone; light stress

輕脆.definition: sharp and clear; crisp; melodious; ringing; tinkling; silvery (of sound); fragile; frail; also written 清脆

輕蔑.definition: scornful; disdainful; contemptuous; pejorative; disdain; contempt

輕薄.definition: light (weight); frivolous; a philanderer; to scorn; disrespectful

輕裘肥馬.definition: lit. light furs and stout horses; fig. to live in luxury

輕視.definition: contempt; contemptuous; to despise; to scorn; scornful

輕質石油.definition: light petroleum (product); gasoline and diesel oil

輕質石油產品.pinyin: qīng zhì shí yóu chǎn pǐn
輕質石油產品.definition: light petroleum product (i.e. gasoline and diesel oil)

輕車熟路.definition: lit. to drive a lightweight chariot on a familiar road (idiom); fig. to do sth routinely and with ease; a walk in the park

輕車簡從.definition: (of an official) to travel with little luggage and just a small escort; to travel without ostentation

輕軌.definition: light rail; transit system (underground, at street level or elevated); streetcar; metro (abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1xing2 gui3dao4 jiao1tong1])

輕重.definition: severity (of the case); degree of seriousness; whether sth is slight or serious

輕重主次.definition: to invert the importance of things (i.e. stress the incidental and neglect the main point); lacking a sense of perspective; to put the cart before the horse

輕重倒置.definition: to invert the importance of things (i.e. stress the unimportant and neglect the important); lacking a sense of perspective; to put the cart before the horse

輕重緩急.definition: slight or important, urgent or non-urgent (idiom); to deal with important matters first; sense of priority

輕鐵.definition: Hong Kong LRT (Light Rail Transit) (abbr. for 輕便鐵路|轻便铁路)

輕饒.definition: to forgive easily; to let off lightly (often with negative: you won't get away with it)

輕饒素放.definition: easily forgive, simply release (idiom); to let sb off scot free

輕鬆.definition: light; gentle; relaxed; effortless; uncomplicated; to relax; to take things less seriously
